To extract the file we can: 
```{bash eval=FALSE}
sh  dragen-4.0.3-8.el7.x86_64.run --noexec --target Dragen.run
# or
chmod +x dragen-4.0.3-8.el8.x86_64.run
./dragen-4.0.3-8.el8.x86_64.run --target dragen.run
```
